author: pamarcelot
msg: Fix for DIRAPI-42 (Add additional classes and clean method arguments for SASL binds (CRAM-MD5, DIGEST-MD5, GSS-API)).
Added support for the 'PREFERENCE_USE_KRB5_SYSTEM_PROPERTIES' pref property when connecting via GSSAPI.
